about_the_game:
Embark on a unique first-person farming adventure in Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey. This immersive game takes you into the heart of the countryside, where you'll nurture your farm from a humble plot to a thriving agricultural haven. With a rich blend of farming, crafting, and survival elements, every decision you make impacts your journey, creating a deeply personalized experience. From the soft morning light breaking over your fields to the tranquil nights under starlit skies, each day brings new challenges and rewards.



Features:

  • First-Person Perspective: Experience the beauty and hardships of farming life through the eyes of your character, making every action more personal and immersive.
  • Inventory System: Manage a comprehensive inventory of tools, crops, and resources essential for your farm's growth and your survival.
  • Crafting System: Craft tools, equipment, and more from materials gathered around your farm and beyond to aid in your agricultural endeavors.
  • Character Equipment: Equip your farmer with various tools and items that aid in farming, resource gathering, and exploring.
  • Resource Gathering: Collect materials from the environment, including wood, rock, and metals, crucial for building and crafting.
  • Character Attributes: Monitor and maintain your character's health and energy attributes to keep them in top farming shape.
  • Farming: Engage in detailed farming mechanics, including sowing seeds, managing plant and fruit growth, and mastering the art of the hoe and watering can.
  • Livestock and Wild Animals: Raise livestock for their produce and interact with wild animals displaying unique behaviors such as wandering, escaping, and chasing.
  • Hunting and Fishing: Supplement your farm's produce with a variety of hunting and fishing activities, bringing more diversity to your table and inventory.
  • Culinary Arts: Prepare delicious meals with your farm's bounty. Cooking provides essential nutrients.
  • Trading: Utilize the NPC store to buy necessary items and sell your farm's produce, managing your resources effectively to ensure your farm's prosperity.
  • Combat: Defend your farm and explore safely with combat mechanics, including attacking and managing health points against wild animals or threats.
  • Item Durability and Food Spoilage: Manage your tools and produce, considering their lifespan and freshness to maximize their utility and value.
  • Storage Solutions: Keep your valuables safe and organized in storage chests scattered across your property.
  • Pets and Companions: Enjoy the company of loyal pets, each with unique behaviors such as following, attacking, and digging.
  • Horse Riding: Traverse the vast landscapes faster and more efficiently on the back of your trusty steed.
  • Progression: Earn experience and level up your character, unlocking new abilities, recipes, and farming techniques.
  • Bonus Effects: Discover and utilize consumables and equipment that temporarily boost your stats, giving you an edge in your daily tasks.
  • Dynamic World: Live through a realistic game clock and day/night cycle, affecting plant growth, animal behavior, and NPC availability.
  • Robust Save/Load System: Pick up right where you left off with a flexible save/load system, ensuring your progress is always secure.



Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey combines the tranquility of country life with the thrill of adventure and survival. Whether you're tending to your crops, exploring the wilderness, expanding your farm, or fight in the wilderness, each day is a step towards becoming a master of your own agricultural destiny. Are you ready to sow the seeds of your future?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.

short_description: Embark on a first-person farming simulator in Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey. Cultivate your land, craft, gather resources, raise livestock, and defend your farm. Every sunrise brings new adventures. Are you ready to grow?
